original_text: I went to the Fountain Gate and then to the King's Pool. The path there was too narrow for my donkey to pass through.
korean_text: 앞으로 나아가 샘문과 왕의 못에 이르러서는 탄 짐승이 지나갈 곳이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: I went to the Fountain Gate
and then to the King's Pool
The path there was too narrow
for my donkey to pass through
